A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: People hated on TFA for being too much of a retread\, and now they hate on this movie for doing something different. This movie was bold enough to go in a new direction and take risks. Ladies and gentlemen\, if any of you naysayers understood that trilogies have beginnings\, middles\, and ends\, you'd understand that everything going on in TLJ has a reason\, and when IX comes out you'll be eating some humble pie when you're first in line and go \"now I see what happened.\" So hands down for me\, best Star Wars PERIOD.
